articles.author: Kenneth Kiesnoski
articles.title: Eager to travel, Americans book Sun Belt beach, city stays as pandemic fades - CNBC
articles.description: Among the most eager travelers in the world, Americans are researching and booking summer getaways to sunny domestic spots that are reopening.
articles.content:
Interest in travel is picking up as the pandemic winds down, and cooped-up Americans are itching to hit the road again, two recent surveys have found.

articles.title: Forget Going Back to the Office—People Are Just Quitting Instead - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: As the pandemic clouds lift, the percentage of Americans leaving employers for new opportunities is at its highest level in more than two decades
articles.content: More Americans are quitting their jobs than at any other time in at least two decades, adding to the struggle many companies face trying to keep up with the economic recovery.The wave of resignations… [+7237 chars]
